name: Bubble Shooter Game
description:
A simple bubble shooter game, as simple as where you are given a challenge to shoot balloons with a color target that changes according to a given color target. And if you shoot wrong you will lose.

____________________________________

Reach and connect me on

LinkedIn | Instagram | Github

Key Note :

  • ↑ : Move Up
  • ↓ : Move Down
  • Space : Shoot
